---
name: "Feature request"
about: Propose a new feature or workflow for PediScreen AI
labels: ["feature", "product"]
---

## Summary

Short description of the proposed feature and who it helps (CHWs, clinicians, parents, admins).

## Problem Statement

What specific problem or workflow gap does this address?

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution, including:

- New pages or routes
- New components or data visualizations
- Backend or integration changes

## Clinical / Operational Impact

- How does this improve screening quality, safety, or throughput?
- Are there regulatory or compliance implications?

## Alternatives Considered

List any alternative approaches you considered and why they are less suitable.

## Additional Context

Designs, links to research, or related tickets.
